title: Swap the final romantic image on the /forever page

requirements.text: Replace the final romantic image shown at the bottom of the /forever page with a different romantic image, keeping the existing styling (rounded frame, border, shadow, and overlay gradient) and ensuring the image loads as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: The /forever page displays the new final romantic image in the final image section (replacing the previous one).
The new image is served from a file under frontend/public/assets/generated and loads without 404s in production builds.
The final image container styling remains consistent (rounded-3xl frame, border, shadow, and top overlay gradient remain visually intact).

constraints: Do not route images through the backend; serve them as frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the copy/text on the /forever page beyond what is required to swap the image.
Do not make additional changes to background music behavior as part of this request.

required: Romantic couple silhouette at sunset with soft bokeh hearts, cinematic lighting, warm blush/champagne palette (final-romantic-scene-v2.dim_1920x1080.png)
